text:
於官方 App 內啟用 Gogoro Rewards，1 點就是 $1 元，
親愛的用戶，您好：
Gogoro Network 不會通知您變更付款方式或主動提供您銀行及信用卡客服電話，亦不會在電話中請您提供信用卡及銀行資料。 若您接獲類似通知，請提高警覺勿上當，建議您可撥打 165 防詐騙專線確認。
若有任何問題，可至支援服務中心查詢，或至官網 - 聯絡我們，我們將盡快為您服務。
trans:
Activate Gogoro Rewards in the official app, where 1 point equals $1.
Dear User,
Gogoro Network will never notify you to change your payment method or provide you with bank or credit card customer service numbers, nor will it ask you to provide bank or credit card information over the phone. If you receive such notifications, please remain vigilant and avoid falling for scams. You can dial the 165 Anti-Fraud Hotline for verification.
For any questions, please visit our Support Center or contact us via our official website under "Contact Us," and we will assist you promptly.
